Long-term EOSFactory Roadmap¶

Support for other IDEs¶

Right now we are aiming for integration with Visual Studio Code (VSC), but we also consider supporting other IDEs, e.g. Eclipse.

GUI support¶

As far as VSC is concerned, we’d like to create a VSC extension providing GUI interface to EOSFactory CLI functionality.

Two implementations¶

We are also considering splitting the EOSFactory project into two implementations: pure Python (based on unittest or pytest) and pure C++ (based on Boost Unit Test Framework).

Ricardian Contracts¶

We are thinking about integrating Ricardian Contracts into our unit-testing. This is a very interesting (and probably not widely known at this stage) aspect of EOS smart-contracts. For more information please refer to EOSIO documentation.
